<i>article</i><br><ol><li>the</li></ol>:
verb
  1. to hit or strike (a target)
  2. to guess or hazard

prep
  1. of the (Combination of: de + 'a)
  2. from the (Combination of: da + 'a)

intj
  1. (after being thanked) you're welcome, don't mention it etc.
  2. (in response to a request) yes, of course
